participant_2.background:
I live in the Midwest with my family, but I like to spend time alone sometimes.
I'm nervous about my first day of safety patrol.
i have three tattoos.
I am proud of my ability to take care of myself and my cats.
I'd brag to my friends about my massive collection of foreign films.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing?
Doing well, nervous about my first day of safety patrol!
Oh wow! I used to be a safety patroller. It was a lot of fun.
Really? What was your favorite part?
I think my favorite part was getting to help people and keep them safe.
Yeah that sounds like it would be fun. I'm just a little nervous about it.
You'll be fine! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks, I hope so!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my cats, read, and watch foreign films.
Oh nice! I love to read too. What's your favorite book?
I'm not sure I have a favorite book, but I really like the Harry Potter series.
That's a great series! I've read them all too.
Yeah, they're so good! What foreign films do you like to watch?
I like a lot of different kinds of foreign films, but some of my favorites are The Seventh Seal, Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, and Oldboy.
Oh nice! I've seen The Seventh Seal and Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon. I really liked them both.
Yeah, they're both great movies. I haven't seen Oldboy yet, but I've heard good things about it.
It's really good! I definitely recommend it.
I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's on Netflix.
Okay, I'll check it out.
Cool! Let me know what you think.
I will!
